snippet.title: Time Keeper (Official Game Play Trailer)
snippet.description: Game play trailer from our new indie puzzle platformer video game "Time Keeper".  A single player story driven adventure.  You'll flip switches, engage with unique mechanical devices and avoid danger at every turn.  All to correct the malfunctioning "Cosmic Clock".  The game features a unique sound track along with quality cinematics to guide the action. Wishlist now on Steam. https://store.steampowered.com/app/1727500/Time_Keeper/
